Class TransporterException

  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.frdfsnlght.transporter.api.TransporterException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GateException, RemoteException, ReservationException
public class TransporterException
extends java.lang.Exception

Base class for all Transporter exceptions.

All Transporter exceptions support a format string that can use optionally supplied arguments during exception creation. The format string follows the same rules as the java.lang.String.format method.

See Also:
